Class BloodBagController

java.lang.Object
it.unisannio.ingsof20_21.group8.Care.Spring.BloodBagController

extends java.lang.Object

    • filterBloodBagsByState

      @GetMapping("/bloodbag/get/state/{state}") public java.lang.Iterable<BloodBagDAO> filterBloodBagsByState​(@PathVariable java.lang.String state)
      gets all the blood bags having a specific state
      Parameters:
      state - the bloodbag state : {Available,Transfered,Used,Dropped}
      Returns:
      all the blood bags with the given state

    • getBloodBagByGroup

      @GetMapping("/bloodbag/get/group/{group}") public java.lang.Iterable<BloodBagDAO> getBloodBagByGroup​(@PathVariable java.lang.String group)
      get all the blood bags having a specific blood group
      Parameters:
      group - the bloodbag blood group : {Apos, Aneg, Bpos, Bneg, ZEROpos, ZEROneg, ABpos, ABneg}
      Returns:
      all the blood bags with the given group

    • useBloodBag

      @DeleteMapping("/bloodbag/use/{serial}") public BloodBagDAO useBloodBag​(@PathVariable("serial") java.lang.String serial)
      this method is called to USE a blood bag, it changes the blood bag state to "Used" 1) find blood bag 2) delete the blood bag 3) modify the blood bag state 4) save the new bloood bag
      Parameters:
      serial - the blood bag serial
      Returns:
      blood bag

    • exportToJson

      @GetMapping("/export/bloodbag/json") public void exportToJson()
      this method exports a json containing all the blood bags

      Parameters:
      bean - the bean used to generate the json object
      Returns:
      jsonObject the object generated from the bean
